title: Nate starts things off with a bang
author: VD
content_html: The infamous White Slaver, inveterate Rebel and uncompromising resister of Northern Aggression has his own blog. Visit it. The name alone is a classic.
content_text:
The infamous White Slaver, inveterate Rebel and uncompromising resister of Northern Aggression
has his own blog
.  Visit it.  The name alone is a classic.
